i think i might need help.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for work?
Hi there! I'm a web developer. What do you do?
I was a server at a restaurant, but I just got a new job as a customer service rep.
Oh nice! I used to be a server too. It's tough work, but it's a great way to make money.
Yeah it was! I was always on my feet. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to lift weights, go for walks, and cook. I also love my dog. He's a Doberman Pinscher.
Oh that's great! I like to ride my bike and take walks too. I also love to cook.
That's awesome! What's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. I'm not sure why, but I love the smell of fresh pasta.
That's so funny, I love the smell of fresh bread! I love cooking mushroom ravioli with my dog.
That sounds delicious! I'll have to try that sometime.
You should! It's really easy to make and it's so delicious.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm always happy to give cooking suggestions.
